Clear HGNC Caches

Source: R/hgnc_rest_client.R
clear_hgnc_cache.Rd

Clears both session-level (memoise) caches and local file caches used by hgnc.mcp. This forces fresh API calls and file downloads on the next request.

Usage

clear_hgnc_cache()

Value

Invisible TRUE

Details

This clears:

  • The memoise cache for functions like hgnc_rest_info()

  • The local file cache (hgnc_complete_set.txt and metadata)

It does NOT affect:

  • The rate limiter state (use reset_rate_limiter() for that)

You might want to clear the cache when:

  • You know the HGNC database has been updated

  • You're debugging and want to ensure fresh data

  • You're running tests

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
# Get info (will hit API)
info1 <- hgnc_rest_info()

# Get info again (will use cache)
info2 <- hgnc_rest_info()

# Clear cache
clear_hgnc_cache()

# Get info again (will hit API)
info3 <- hgnc_rest_info()
} # }

On this page
